attributes.action: pay people what is owed from the childrens tax allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the tax office are yet again evading their responsibilies and not paying people what they are entitled to. the childrens tax allowance for up to april 2003 is yet again another farce created by an incompetant service, the government should intervene and allow all the struggling families to have this money and not leave it to a bungling out dated department who ignore phone calls and dont even open letters, then just tell people they cant have what they are entitled to because claims were not submitted in time when in actual fact they were sent well before the cut off date, they  just dont want to pay out !! GIVE THE ORDINARY PERSON WHAT THEY ARE OWED !!!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
